dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Propane is an alkane molecule. It is completely saturated and contains no double bonds. The compound has 3 carbon atoms and 8 hydrogen atoms. The generic formula for an ether is R-O-R.
丙烷是一种烷烃分子。它完全饱和，不含双键。该化合物有 3 个碳原子和 8 个氢原子。醚的通式为 R-O-R。
